alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ford and southwestern Iroquois Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arrowsmith to near Bellflower. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Gibson City, Buckley, Melvin, Loda, Elliott and Clarence. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 258 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for east central Illinois.
